Miscellaneous Highlights: Jimmy Butler left the game with a right ankle sprain after suffering an injury in the first quarter.
Others: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra expressed uncertainty about Jimmy Butler's injury status.
Nikola Jovic was benched in the second half and finished with 11 points, 4 rebounds, and 3 steals.
Jaime Jaquez Jr. is expected to return soon after missing three games due to a stomach illness.
Tyler Herro led the team with 24 points, 7 rebounds, and a career-high 11 assists.
